    This class is the main class for running EDCoW
    Author:
    Yue HE & Falitokiniaina RABEARISON

      Print the main menu of the application
      private static void setParameters()
      To Treat the menu set parameters - Display the menu that can be done with the parameters (display - modify) At the same time, the values of the parameters in the memory are changed and the values in the 'param' file changed as well.
      private static void TreatSignals()
      Treat the whole signals (nt, nwt) by splitting them into windows.
      private static void writeInFileParam()
      Write the current values in the HashMap mapParam as parameters, into the file 'param'

      • setParameters

        private static void setParameters()
                           throws IOException
        To Treat the menu set parameters - Display the menu that can be done with the parameters (display - modify) At the same time, the values of the parameters in the memory are changed and the values in the 'param' file changed as well.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • TreatSignals

        private static void TreatSignals()
                          throws InterruptedException,
                                 IOException
        Treat the whole signals (nt, nwt) by splitting them into windows. The length of the window is an input from the user, defined in the 'param' file. - That is read the files, - Put them in the memory, - affect to a thread to treat a window - process the threads selected by the user after prompt - put in 'events' all the events detected in each window If debug mode is enabled, all the files (detected events, detected keywords) are stored in the folder 'results'.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        IOException
